downloadTitle: Microsoft Lync 2010 Sharing and Collaboration Quick Reference Card
downloadDescription: This quick reference card describes what you can share and collaborate on during a Microsoft Lync 2010 meeting or instant messaging (IM) conversation.
detailsSection: There are many options in Microsoft Lync 2010 communications software during a meeting or instant messaging (IM) conversation to share and collaborate. This includes, sharing your desktop or a program, attaching a file to a meeting, conducting a poll that consists of one question and up to seven possible choices, creating and collaborating on a virtual whiteboard, and giving Microsoft PowerPoint presentations.
installInstructionSection: To install this download, save the file to a directory on your computer. After you save the file, open the document as you typically would. To remove the download, delete the file from the directory where you saved it.
